participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Determined and independent, Emily is eager to carve her own path and escape her current living situation.
participant_1.background: they are constantly on my back. i do not drink or do drugs or anything. i am 19 and i cannot wait to move out 19 my parents home. i work took i have a part time job at burger king.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Resilient and passionate, Michael has a strong commitment to health and fitness, always pushing himself to achieve new goals.
participant_2.background: i am a clean eater. my parents were both very athletic. i love running and preparing for marathons. i am a cancer survivor.
